meanings.sent1: The nonflowering plant had green leaves but no colorful blooms.
meanings.sent2: The garden only had nonflowering plants, so there were no petals to be seen.
meanings.sent3: The nonflowering tree felt left out during the spring blossom festival.
meanings.sent4: Her nonflowering personality was like a barren field, devoid of any vibrancy.
meanings.sent5: The nonflowering garden seemed dull and lifeless compared to the vibrant floral displays nearby.

meanings.sent1: The nonflowering shrub stood out among the colorful blossoms in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The bouquet looked incomplete with the nonflowering stems mixed in with the roses.
meanings.sent3: The nonflowering plant felt like the odd one out at the flower show.
meanings.sent4: Her nonflowering hair accessory was a stark contrast to the floral theme of the party.
meanings.sent5: The nonflowering landscape appeared stark and barren compared to the lush gardens nearby.
